SEARCH
Package Controller.Panier

Class ControllerPanier

java.lang.Object
Controller.Panier.ControllerPanier
All Implemented Interfaces:
ControllerPanierInterface
public class ControllerPanier extends Object implements ControllerPanierInterface
Controller for managing the shopping cart functionalities in the application. This controller handles the addition of tickets to the shopping cart based on user selections.

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    void
    addPanier(int idSeance, int idUser, int idOffer, int price, boolean status, int quantity, String mail)
    Adds a specified quantity of tickets for a given seance to the shopping cart, associated with a user and potentially an offer.

  • Method Details

    • addPanier

      public void addPanier(int idSeance, int idUser, int idOffer, int price, boolean status, int quantity, String mail)
      Adds a specified quantity of tickets for a given seance to the shopping cart, associated with a user and potentially an offer.
      Specified by:
      addPanier in interface ControllerPanierInterface
      Parameters:
      idSeance - The ID of the seance for which tickets are being added.
      idUser - The ID of the user adding tickets to their cart.
      idOffer - The ID of any offer applied to these tickets (default is 1, indicating no specific offer).
      price - The price of each ticket.
      status - The status of the ticket (e.g., active or inactive).
      quantity - The number of tickets to add.
      mail - The email address associated with the user for ticket confirmation.
